meta_description: The Finger Lakes Boating Museum exists to provide educational programming and exhibits that help preserve the rich boating history of the Finger Lakes.
hours_text:
# Visit Us!

Open Daily  
10:00 AM - 4:00 PM

Adults  
$12  
  
Seniors, Veterans,  
College Students  
$10  
  
Youth (7-18)  
$6  
  
Museums for All  
$3  
  
Active Military, Youth Under 7, Museum Members  
Free

DIRECTIONS | PARKING  
  
We are located on Pleasant Valley Rd just outside the village of Hammondsport. Our building is across from Pleasant Valley Winery and has two large wooden arched doorways on the front. Our driveway is on the southern side of the main building. Follow the signs all the way up the hill and parking is provided at the back of the building where our main entrance is located.   
  
8231 Pleasant Valley Rd  
Hammondsport, NY 14840  
​607-569-2222

We are proud participants in the Museums for All program

[Read More ](https://www.flbm.org/museums-for-all)

We are a North American Reciprocal Museum!

[Read More ](https://narmassociation.org/)

admission_text:
## Become a Member!

Being a member of Finger Lakes Boating Museum is more than newsletters and yearly support. We strive to build a community within our membership with special events for all members and different benefits at higher levels of membership. FLBM is supported mainly by membership and has a great appreciation for the support we receive. North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Association benefits are available at higher levels of membership, which offers free admission at over 1,000 institutions across North America. FLBM uses a rolling membership so your membership will run for one year from the first of the month you joined. 

[Learn more about NARM here! ](https://narmassociation.org/)

#### Compare membership levels below!

collections_text:
# Visit!

[Open Daily 10 a.m.-4 p.m. ](https://www.flbm.org/general-6)

#### Preserving, Educating & Celebrating Finger Lakes Boating!

There is something for everyone here at FLBM!

###### For Boating enthusiasts...

Dozens of Finger Lakes boat builders are represented throughout six galleries, totaling over 100 boats to see!

[Tour Highlights ](https://www.flbm.org/inside-the-galleries)

###### May thru October, Cruise with Us Aboard The Pat II!

Experience boating on one of our public tours, specialty cruises, or your own private charter.

[The Pat II & Lake Cruises ](https://www.flbm.org/pat-ii)

###### Calling all Art Lovers!

Come for the boats, marvel in the art! See one of a kind murals, original paintings, and framed prints related to Finger Lakes Boating.

Read More

###### Join the Keuka Dragons!

FLBM is proud to host our own Dragon Boat club! Members train, compete, and volunteer to encourage new paddlers.

[Learn more and Join Today! ](https://www.flbm.org/keuka-dragons)

###### Fun for the Whole Family!

Hey kids- pretend you're a boat captain, build a model sailboat, and even practice rowing on a machine built to train Olympians!

[Kids Under 12 are Free! ](https://www.flbm.org/general-6)

###### Partners in Education

Schools, Homeschool Families, and Group Tours Welcome! Our hands-on collection is a one-of-a-kind learning experience!

[Plan your Visit ](https://www.flbm.org/general-6)

[](https://www.flbm.org/pat-ii)
